analysis.description: PiperToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#177-185) is declared view but contains assembly code

PiperToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#88-90) shadows:
	- ERC223.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#35)
empty in PiperToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#169-173) is a local variable never initialiazed
tkn in ContractReceiver.tokenFallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#15-16) is a local variable never initialiazed

PiperToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#117-126) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > endICO (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#117-118)

PiperToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#177-185)
	- /unique_chucks/26/0x6f59c5e4a98bbeca595cd8f44d4ae6c1f055edbc.sol#183-184
